name: Rank
description: The static rank roughly reflects the log probability of an entity being 'important' - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/academic-services/graph/resources-faq#what-is-the-rank-value-on-entities

name: NormalizedName
description: Normalised name of the Field of Study

name: DisplayName
description: The displayed name of the Field of Study

name: MainType
description: Optional: The type or category of entity this field of study belongs within

name: PaperCount
description: The number of Papers that have been identified from this Field of Study

name: PaperFamilyCount
description: Same as PaperCount with the following provisions - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/academic-services/graph/resources-faq#papercount-vs-paperfamilycount

name: CitationCount
description: The sum of citations for Papers that have been linked to this Field of Study

name: CreatedDate
description: The date in which this record was first created
